languages.text: {n}Маражай смотрит на вас с глумливым изумлением.{/n} "Ты же не позволишь дерзости твоих слуг остаться без ответа? Позволь мне порадовать тебя расправой — тебе известно, сколь я искусен в этом деле, ты не останешься разочарованн{mf|ым|ой}!"

{n}Marazhai looks at you in derisive surprise.{/n} "You will not let the insolence of your servants go unanswered, will you? Allow me to gratify you by putting them in their place. You know that punishment is a particular skill of mine — you will not be disappointed!"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай смотрит на вас с глумливым изумлением.{/n} "Ты же не позволишь дерзости твоих слуг остаться без ответа? Позволь мне порадовать тебя расправой — тебе известно, сколь я искусен в этом деле, ты не останешься разочарованн{mf|ым|ой}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you in derisive surprise.{/n} "You will not let the insolence of your servants go unanswered, will you? Allow me to gratify you by putting them in their place. You know that punishment is a particular skill of mine — you will not be disappointed!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋故作惊讶地看着你。{/n}“这些人如此无礼，你该不会就这么放他们走吧？请允许让我替你摆清他们的位置，让你开心开心。你肯清楚，惩罚是我最擅长的事情——我绝不会让你失望！”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you in derisive surprise.{/n} "You will not let the insolence of your servants go unanswered, will you? Allow me to gratify you by putting them in their place. You know that punishment is a particular skill of mine — you will not be disappointed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋故作惊讶地看着你。{/n}“这些人如此无礼，你该不会就这么放他们走吧？请允许让我替你摆清他们的位置，让你开心开心。你肯清楚，惩罚是我最擅长的事情——我绝不会让你失望！”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te mira con una divertida cara de sorpresa.{/n} «No pensarás dejar sin castigo la insolencia de tus sirvientes, ¿verdad? Permíteme complacerte poniéndolos en su sitio. Ya sabes que castigar es una de mis especialidades; ¡no te decepcionaré!».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you in derisive surprise.{/n} "You will not let the insolence of your servants go unanswered, will you? Allow me to gratify you by putting them in their place. You know that punishment is a particular skill of mine — you will not be disappointed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te mira con una divertida cara de sorpresa.{/n} «No pensarás dejar sin castigo la insolencia de tus sirvientes, ¿verdad? Permíteme complacerte poniéndolos en su sitio. Ya sabes que castigar es una de mis especialidades; ¡no te decepcionaré!».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous jette un regard narquois teinté de surprise.{/n} « Vous n'allez tout de même pas laisser vos serviteurs faire preuve d'une telle insolence sans aucunes représailles ? Laissez-moi les remettre à leur place en votre nom. Vous savez que je maîtrise à merveille l'art du châtiment. Vous ne serez pas {mf|déçu|déçue}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you in derisive surprise.{/n} "You will not let the insolence of your servants go unanswered, will you? Allow me to gratify you by putting them in their place. You know that punishment is a particular skill of mine — you will not be disappointed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous jette un regard narquois teinté de surprise.{/n} « Vous n'allez tout de même pas laisser vos serviteurs faire preuve d'une telle insolence sans aucunes représailles ? Laissez-moi les remettre à leur place en votre nom. Vous savez que je maîtrise à merveille l'art du châtiment. Vous ne serez pas {mf|déçu|déçue}. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sieht dich mit verächtlicher Überraschung an.{/n} "Ihr werdet die Unverschämtheit Eurer Diener doch wohl nicht einfach so stehen lassen, oder? Erlaubt mir, Euch einen Gefallen zu gestatten und sie für Euch in die Schranken zu weisen. Ihr wisst ja, Bestrafen ist meine absolute Spezialität – Ihr werdet sicher nicht enttäuscht werden!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you in derisive surprise.{/n} "You will not let the insolence of your servants go unanswered, will you? Allow me to gratify you by putting them in their place. You know that punishment is a particular skill of mine — you will not be disappointed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sieht dich mit verächtlicher Überraschung an.{/n} "Ihr werdet die Unverschämtheit Eurer Diener doch wohl nicht einfach so stehen lassen, oder? Erlaubt mir, Euch einen Gefallen zu gestatten und sie für Euch in die Schranken zu weisen. Ihr wisst ja, Bestrafen ist meine absolute Spezialität – Ihr werdet sicher nicht enttäuscht werden!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは嘲笑するような驚きを浮かべてあなたを見る。{/n}「従者の横暴を見逃すわけにはいかないだろう？奴らに立場をわきまえさせることで、お前を満足させてやろう。罰を与えるのは俺の得意技だ…失望はさせないさ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you in derisive surprise.{/n} "You will not let the insolence of your servants go unanswered, will you? Allow me to gratify you by putting them in their place. You know that punishment is a particular skill of mine — you will not be disappointed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは嘲笑するような驚きを浮かべてあなたを見る。{/n}「従者の横暴を見逃すわけにはいかないだろう？奴らに立場をわきまえさせることで、お前を満足させてやろう。罰を与えるのは俺の得意技だ…失望はさせないさ！」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, alaycı bir şaşkınlıkla sana bakıyor.{/n} "Hizmetkârlarının cüretkârlığını karşılıksız bırakmayacaksın, değil mi? Bırak onlara hadlerini bildirerek seni memnun edeyim. Biliyorsun ki cezalandırma, bilhassa yetenekli olduğum bir alan. Hayal kırıklığına uğramazsın!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you in derisive surprise.{/n} "You will not let the insolence of your servants go unanswered, will you? Allow me to gratify you by putting them in their place. You know that punishment is a particular skill of mine — you will not be disappointed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, alaycı bir şaşkınlıkla sana bakıyor.{/n} "Hizmetkârlarının cüretkârlığını karşılıksız bırakmayacaksın, değil mi? Bırak onlara hadlerini bildirerek seni memnun edeyim. Biliyorsun ki cezalandırma, bilhassa yetenekli olduğum bir alan. Hayal kırıklığına uğramazsın!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
